title: Gem
description: Gem is your all-in-one solution for converting candidates into hires faster. It includes integrated products for sourcing, CRM, AI, talent marketing, and analytics to help recruiting teams hire with ease and efficiency. Whether you’re looking to consolidate without compromise or bring your own ATS to the party, Gem makes it easy to connect with the tools you use every day. It's why over 1,200 industry leaders including Wayfair, Dropbox, Cintas, & UnitedHealth, trust Gem to fuel their growth.
